author: liamhorne3565
content: As <@552133098075193354> mentioned (and <@420951281910284289> has been advocating for ...), let's move technical 4844 discussions into here and out of Telegram so give more people visibility into what's being discussed üôè

author: daniellehrner
content: Is there any timeline for 4844? Are there for example plans to include it in Shanghai?

author: liamhorne3565
content: Yeah that is the current objective. We're going to do our best to get production-ready implementations and analysis done to help others understand and test it. Trying to avoid distracting anyone from The Merge right now which is P0 for Ethereum, but generally that's the goal üôÇ

author: jessepollak
content: Hi all - Jesse from Coinbase here, going to bring in a few folks on our side who are interested in collaborating to support EIP-4844.

author: john.p.cb
content: Hi all - John here from Coinbase. As <@561275259454619659> mentioned, I'm happy to collaborate to support EIP-4844

author: jessepollak
content: Also just to set context here - we're going to start small and build up, we haven't officially allocated resources to this at Coinbase just yet, so this will be motivated folks nights and weekends.

author: donaldinho.eth
content:
Hi all. 
Don from Coinbase here too. Excited to see where we can help out
